lyrics.stanza: O doubting, struggling Christian, Why thus in anguish pray? O cease to doubt and struggle, There is a better way.
Give up thy will to Jesus, And trust Him though He slay; Hush all thy fears and questions, And settle it today.
O soul so tossed with tempest, Upon His promise stay; Cast out faith's strong sheet anchor, And settle it today.
Lord, I give up the struggle, To Thee commit my way; I trust Thy word forever, And settle it today.
